llm_text:
Why:
- payment_format_ach (value=1) strongly increased the model score (positive driver).
- to_bank (value=22) increased the score.
- amount_received (13338.3) and amount_paid (13338.3) both increased the score.
- dayofweek (value=6 â†’ Sunday) increased the score.
- from_bank (value=20) decreased the score (partial offset).

Conclusion:
The alert is primarily driven by an ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) on a Sunday (dayofweek=6) for a mid-sized amount (amount_received/amount_paid = 13,338.3) into receiving bank 22; sending bank 20 slightly reduced the score. If one accepts only these features, the combination of ACH + Sunday + this amount to bank 22 explains why the model flagged the transaction, although the decreased contribution from from_bank=20 mitigates risk somewhat.
